title: Astronomers stunned by unprecedented short and hot flares emitted by a supermassive black hole
desc: The discovery challenges existing theories of how matter close to supermassive black holes behaves.

title: Contaminated formula milk left my baby hospitalised, says Wirral mum

title: Popular K-Pop Male Singer Confirmed To Having A Child From Previous Relationship
desc: It was recently reported that popular K-pop male singer 'A' confirmed that he had a child with his former partner four years ago.

title: Prime minister Ngurare vows tough action on non-performing contractors
desc: %%title%% %%sep%% %%primary_category%% %%sep%% %%sitename%% %%sep%% Prime minister Elijah Ngurare has warned contractors and service providers that failure to meet agreed timelines or the abandonment of government projects will no longer be tolerated, signalling a tougher approach to accountability in public service delivery.

title: Gideon Sa'ar responds to Yvette Cooper’s criticism at UN
desc: Gideon Sa'ar sharply responded to Yvette Cooper's criticism of Israel's land policies at the UN, referencing the Balfour Declaration and historical British support for a Jewish homeland.

title: Britain's Got Talent dancer Kerri-Anne Donaldson found dead at home had been accused of 'child sex offence', inquest hears
desc: The 38-year-old, who reached the semi-final of Britain's Got Talent as part of a dance group, was found dead at her home in Farnborough, Hampshire, the morning after being released from hospital.
